description: An average cotton jacket stripped of all it's parts, just an empty hollow. Insert your desired cloth, & create a nice jacket.
An average cotton jacket stripped of all it's parts, just an empty hollow for your new, beautiful form to crawl into. Insert your desired cloth, & create a nice jacket.

A standard cotton bomber stripped of all it's parts, but also some additional waterproofing, breathability, & environmental protection, at the cost of weight & encumbrance. Insert your desired parts, & create a nice bomber, perfectly fit to your needs.
